html.body:
Index
Previous: ukṣNext: ukṣ2
√ukṣ1 'sprinkle'[6.] ukṣáti etc. V.+ -te etc. V.+
[perfect: ukṣāṃ cakāra ]
aorist: [5.] aukṣiṣam etc.
future: [1.] ukṣiṣyati etc. -- [2.] ukṣitā
verbal: ukṣitá V.+ -úkṣya B.+
secondary: passive: ukṣyate etc. B.+ causative: ukṣayati etc. S.+
derivatives: -ukṣ -ukṣa B.S. ukṣán V.+ úkṣaṇa AV.+ ukṣaṇīya JB. -ukṣitavya B.C. úṣṭṛ B.S. uṣṭṛ́ RV1. úṣṭra V.+
Whether ukṣán and uṣṭṛ́ etc. belong here, is very doubtful.
